name: Symbiotic Manager
description:
Fallen on hard times, a poor fish must make enough money to  stave off the predatory loan agency. Given a second chance, you must do well enough as the shark's property manager to rent out the Grand Anemone and earn your freedom.

Pay attention to the traits of applicants and the properties. Make sure to join together a good match. Build roads to join together the properties for a nice community bonus.
